h3_title: Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Return to Chen Loong (who now stands outside the shack by the water), and deliver the pellet to him. The old dragon will be overjoyed at your gift, and in return will pass along The Ruyi Scroll to you. He'll proclaim that he now has the strength to unseal the Painted Realm, where he and his fellow deities will now reside -- and you're invited!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chen_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Chen Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Return to Chen Loong (who now stands outside the shack by the water), and deliver the pellet to him. The old dragon will be overjoyed at your gift, and in return will pass along The Ruyi Scroll to you. He'll proclaim that he now has the strength to unseal the Painted Realm, where he and his fellow deities will now reside -- and you're invited!
